title.rendered: Macallan 10 Year Old Cask Strength (1 litre)

excerpt.rendered:
Macallan 10 Year old Sherry at Cask Strength. A good old classic Macallan that we just want to open and drink this ourselves!

Bottle size : 1000
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 10
Vintage : 
ABV : 58.60%
